appMotto: Your Free, Open-Source, All-In-One Discord Companion

name: Application
description: Configuration for the bot's application settings.

productionGuildID.name: Production Guild ID
productionGuildID.description: The ID of the production guild where the bot operates.

developmentGuildID.name: Development Guild ID
developmentGuildID.description: The ID of the development guild for testing and development purposes.

isMaintenanceEnabled.name: Maintenance Mode
isMaintenanceEnabled.description: Enable or disable maintenance mode for the bot.

disabledCategories.name: Disabled Categories
disabledCategories.description: List of categories that are disabled in the bot.

webServerIP.name: Web Server IP
webServerIP.description: The IP address of the web server hosting the bot's API.

webServerPort.name: Web Server Port
webServerPort.description: The port number for the web server. Use -1 to disable the web server.

appMotto.name: Application Motto
appMotto.default: Your Free, Open-Source, All-In-One Discord Companion
appMotto.description: The motto of the application displayed in the bot's activity.

appActivity.name: Application Activity
appActivity.description: The activity message displayed by the bot in Discord.

defaultLanguage.name: Default Language
defaultLanguage.description: The default language for the bot's responses and commands. (W.I.P)
